oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Insight into organic education
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Spencer, Tom
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper summarizes the research project iPOPY, emphasising main results from all WPs. NB the page numbers in the enclosed pdf file (28-30) are wrong.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Spencer, Tom (2010) Insight into organic education. International Innovation, 28 May 2010, pp. 26-28.
